import React from 'react' import {Navbar, Nav,Container, Row, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {logout} from '../actions/userActions' const Header = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const userLogin=useSelector(state=>state.userLogin) const {loading,error,userInfo} = userLogin const logoutHandler=()=>{ dispatch(logout()) } return (
Proshop
Cart {userInfo? Profile Logout : Signin }
) } export default Header
